info.author: Lee Harr
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
TZMud is a server to host a multi-user domain (MUD).

TZMud uses several high-quality Python libraries to handle basic functions so
that it can concentrate on the actual MUD functions:

  * Twisted to handle networking and event loop,
  * ZODB to store the data, and
  * Pyparsing to parse player input
info.name: TZMud
info.summary: TZMud is a Python MUD server.
info.html_description:
TZMud is a server to host a multi-user domain (MUD).

TZMud uses several high-quality Python libraries to handle basic functions so that it can concentrate on the actual MUD functions:

  • Twisted to handle networking and event loop,
  • ZODB to store the data, and
  • Pyparsing to parse player input
